name: taskmaster
description: A minimalist and elegant task management application, now with Capacitor.

scripts.dev: mkdir -p public && cp index.html public/ && ([ -f capacitor.js ] && cp capacitor.js public/ || true) && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=public/index.js --loader:.tsx=tsx --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"development"' --define:process.env.API_KEY='"$API_KEY"' --servedir=public
scripts.build: mkdir -p public && cp index.html public/ && ([ -f capacitor.js ] && cp capacitor.js public/ || true) && esbuild index.tsx --bundle --outfile=public/index.js --loader:.tsx=tsx --define:process.env.NODE_ENV='"production"' --define:process.env.API_KEY='"$API_KEY"'
